name: Shuffle
overview: An action game by Roland Tögel and published in 1991 by Tale Software, it was also, later, published in GO64! 1999/02. Do you have extremely strong nerves? Nothing fazes you? Don't you know any sleepless nights? Do you always keep a clear head? If you answered "YES" to all of the questions without hesitation, please read your result under point 1. If you answered all of the questions with a resounding "NO", then please refer to point two. If your answers are mixed, then both evaluations partially apply to you. 1. Congratulations! It's time to play SHUFFLE! Let's see if we can't break her nerves! 2. Well done! It's time to play SHUFFLE! Let's see if we can't completely destroy her nerves! And now please take what you're holding home with you. So at least we can calm our nerves! The Health Department warns: This game can give you fits.
